channel.title: Problem Running Any Hyperions
channel.description:
I am getting this anytime i try running a Hyperion... I have tried installing different jdk's and it has not worked also i tried using eclipse to run it and it has not worked. [code]Nov 09, 2011 5:35:31 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:32 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Nov 09, 2011 5:35:34 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/tho ughtworks/xstream/XStream at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream at org.hyperion.util.XStreamUtil.getXStream(XStreamUtil.java:18) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition.init(GameObjectDefinition .java:27) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$1.call(World.java:118) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 8 more
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Problem Running Any Hyperions
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I am trying to run RuneFocus and Project Annihilation but they both say the same thing. I have tried running it in eclipse as i said before and it didn’t work. I followed many tutorials and none of them have worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem Running Any Hyperions
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Your missing the xstream library which is suppose to be included.

Open it in eclipse, then use the run.bat.

Are you using grhams base? or an edited version?

item.title: Problem Running Any Hyperions
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

I am getting this anytime i try running a Hyperion…
I have tried installing different jdk’s and it has not worked also i tried using eclipse to run it and it has not worked.

[code]Nov 09, 2011 5:35:31 PM org.hyperion.Server main
INFO: Starting Hyperion…
Nov 09, 2011 5:35:32 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init
INFO: Loading definitions…
Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loading definitions…
Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43595…

INFO: Binding to port : 8080…

INFO: Ready
Nov 09, 2011 5:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load
INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions.

INFO: Loading map…

INFO: Binding to port : 43594…

INFO: Loading scripts…
Nov 09, 2011 5:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start
INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks…
Nov 09, 2011 5:35:34 PM org.hyperion.Server main
SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion.
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/tho
ughtworks/xstream/XStream
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source)

gExecutorService.java:50)

Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstream/XStream

.java:27)
